markdown:
| icon           = poe2 hat_tricorn_with_eyepatch icon.png
| description    = Hand-stitched by one of the finest hatters of Selona, the sharp lines of this hat suggest defiance against an uncaring sea. The Erl of Norwaech gifted you the hat in recognition of the foresight - both natural and supernatural - for which you have gained a reputation in the Dyrwood.

You're not sure where the eye patch came from, but it reeks of rum.
